search_parameters.q: The Effect of Sociometric Location on the Adoption of an Innovation within a University Faculty Stern, Louis W. And Others Sociology of Education

search_information.query_displayed: The Effect of Sociometric Location on the Adoption of an Innovation within a University Faculty Stern, Louis W. And Others Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: The effects of sociometric location on the adoption of an innovation within a university faculty
organic_results.snippet: This study, tracing the adoption of an innovative information service among a university faculty, focused on two major themes of the diffusion literature: characteristics and relative centrality of adopters versus non-adopters. Value orientations, demographics, professional background characteristics, and scholarly productivity were of little aid in predicting adoption or non-adoption; centrality was found to be a significant predictor. The study is relatively unique methodologically in that measures of characteristics and centrality were obtained …

publication_info.summary: LW Stern, CS Craig, AJ La Greca, RG Salem - Sociology of Education, 1976 - JSTOR
